description:
The first Neogeo Pocket Color emulator for WebOS, based on Neopop. Runs most games full speed on the original Pre. Install the "Remove Tap Locator" patch from Preware to improve performance when using touch controls. NOTE: The user must supply their own game ROMs and transfer them to the device's internal storage for use with this app.

Features include:
* English/Japanese game language switch support
* Backup memory and save state support, auto-save and ten manual slots for save states. (NOTE: write access to /media/internal is required, some versions of WebOS 1.4.5 are broken and need to be re-installed via WebOS Doctor)
* Zip file support
* Configurable on-screen multi-touch controls in addition to keyboard controls
* iCade support (WebOS 2.0 or later)
* Portrait/Landscape orientation support

Follow me on Twitter for updates about my apps:
https://twitter.com/rakashazi

Visit the homepage at explusalpha.com for more info, ports for other platforms, and my other apps.
